articles.title: Rece Davis predicts Texas Tech-Utah winner - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Rece Davis picked Utah to beat Texas Tech, citing the Utes’ veteran offensive line, defense, and Devon Dampier’s mobility as the difference in Saturday’s Big Noon Kickoff matchup.
articles.content:
